incitationbutton.title: Get the most out of monday.com for your business
incitationbutton.subtitle: Overwhelmed trying to figure out monday.com?
incitationbutton.description: When you get started with Monday.com, figuring out how to structure your company workflow can be overwhelming. Monday.com is such a versatile tool, how do you know where to start and what features to use? You probably have a basic understanding of Monday.com and now you’re ready to learn more; you want to make Monday.com the main hub for your work and have everything in one place but don’t have time to figure it out on your own.

ourservices.title: Our Services
ourservices.description: Maximize the value of Monday.com with our expert services. We bring years of experience to help you build the perfect solution for your organization.
ourservices.choosepackagedesc: Select the service package that best fits your needs and preferences.

services.title: Consulting
items: Review current infrastructure
Mapping existing processes
Identify the bottlenecks & propose solutions
Discuss how Monday can be implemented according to your requirements
List all apps that will be required and how they would interact with each others.

services.title: Implementation
services.description: Set up and customize your Monday.com workspace
items: Setting up account and boards permission
Building & Customizing boards
Setting up automations
Setting up Monday apps or 3rd Party Integration
Set dashboards for reporting
Data Migration to Monday.com from other platforms
Custom Development using Zapier/Make.com or by leveraging Monday's API

services.title: Training & User Adoption
services.description: Ensure your team is effectively trained
items: Ensuring that your team is effectively trained is a critical part of a successful implementation.
We provide different type of training On-Site or via Videoconferencing
Training for managers or dedicated Monday.com admin in the company
Group training with the concerned department
To keep the training interactive and for maximum efficiency we suggest that the group do not exceed 15 persons

services.title: Ongoing Support
items: Monthly review of the solution
Support your team with any questions they might have, this will help for a successful adoption of the solution that was built
Optimization suggestions based on new features available or any changes in your business operations.

herovideo.title: Monday.com can be used as a work OS for almost any business.
herovideo.description: Monday.com is a work operating system (Work OS). You can manage all types of workflow and processes in one place.

mondayworkos.title: The flexible Work OS offers in-depth and effective solutions for every department and use case across your organization while maintaining seamless communication between all of them.

onsiteConsulting.introText: We travel worldwide to implement Monday.com at your premises. On-site implementations are very efficient as we will be able to interact easily with your team and understand your work environment and its challenges. We will map your processes and implement a Monday.com solution working closely with your team. You will be able to test the solution stage by stage, share your feedback and we can together build a tailor-made workflow. This type of collaborative building has proven to have the highest adoption success rate. On-Site Implementation usually facilitates meetings with the different stakeholders (Managers, CEO, Teams, etc.), creating a unique collaborative working experience.

packages.name: Fast Track Package
packages.description: Get up and running with Monday.com in no time. Ideal for small to medium-sized companies.
features: Meeting with the different stakeholders (Managers, CEO, teams, etc.)
Review of the actual system and tools in use
Map processes in place and identify bottlenecks
Assessment on your current setup compared to Monday.com capability & features
A comprehensive walkthrough of Monday.com exposing the various capabilities with a demo of real use cases that can/has been applied to your business
Discuss about possible integrations about some of your system in place
Define the best setup possible for your company using Monday.com and how to start implementing the ideal system would work and how Monday will be set in order to achieve the target

Building & sharing some real case scenarios that can be used to build your system on Monday.com. Please note that some company will have a dedicated person handling the setup of Monday.com but WME Solutions provide also full implementation services based on the diagnostic made.

packages.name: Enterprise Package
packages.description: Ideal for companies where the implementation of Monday.com is required in several divisions (e.g., Sales, Operation, HR, Marketing, etc...)
features: 1 to 2 senior consultants of WME Solutions
Time will be shared between meeting with the stakeholders and creation/implementation of the solution on Monday.com as needed
Full remote support of our office-based team if required
Enablement of our $2,000 package containing apps & plugins that we have developed and that we will enable in your Monday account for a lifetime
Creation of interactive user guides for the solution implemented

reviews.projectName: Consulting & Strategy, Integrations, Data Services, Training & Enablement, Platform Configuration, Workflow Optimization
reviews.reviewText: WME Solutions transformed our real estate management system in Phuket. Eddy, Kessi, and Chan provided outstanding support, flying in on short notice to help us maximize Monday.com. Their expertise in customized workflows and hands-on guidance was invaluable. I highly recommend WME Solutions for their dedication, client success, and ability to deliver under tight deadlines.

Eddy and the team took the time to truly understand our tutoring center’s needs and delivered an outstanding customized solution. They integrated Monday.com with platforms like Make.com and Excel, rebuilding our operations from the ground up. Their professionalism, technical expertise, and ability to streamline processes have been invaluable. If you need a results-driven team, WME Solutions is the way to go.
Everything was clear and easy to work with. The team quickly resolved my workflow and CRM issues with great communication. I highly recommend Eddy and his team.

Travailler avec Eddy a été un véritable atout pour notre équipe. Grâce à son expertise sur Monday, il a optimisé notre gestion de projet et amélioré notre productivité. Toujours à l'écoute, il partage des conseils précieux. Je le recommande sans hésiter !

Eddy was very efficient, understood our needs, and provided video summaries that helped us a lot. Despite timezone differences, he was easy to reach and communicated perfectly with our team in French. We highly recommend him and are very happy with his work.

Eddy has been integral to the growth of our business! His insight, dedication, and support on Monday.com have made Eddy a key part of our team. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him for any process-related projects. A++
Eddy is a Monday expert and an absolutely phenomenal partner to work with. I can't recommend him enough. He will execute any ideas/solutions you have beyond your best expectations.
Eddy is a real monday.com master. Knows what he's doing, responsive and delivers. What more could we have asked for...

reviews.projectName: Project: monday.com expert needed for fine tuning & training
reviews.reviewText: Eddy is great! He is extremely knowledgeable in the monday.com software. He always made the effort to fit me in last minute, and took the time to explain each process with me when I didn't understand something. He has helped me build complicated automations and gave me suggestions to improve my current boards. I will be hiring Eddy again in the future whenever I need further help to develop my monday boards. Thanks Eddy!

reviews.projectName: Project: monday.com Training For Small Business
reviews.reviewText: Eddy did an amazing job at training our team on how to use Monday.com. He is extremely professional, knowledgeable and communicates really well. We will definitely be hiring him in the future for any further training. Thanks Eddy!

reviews.projectName: Project: Monday.com expert need to automate, optimize and integrate platform
reviews.reviewText: Eddy is a real monday.com master. Knows what he's doing, responsive and delivers. What more could we have asked for....

I hired Eddy to set up Monday.com. He was super helpful, a great hire, and I highly recommend him. Eddy is very knowledgeable about Monday.com and up-to-date on features. He was easy to work with, patient, and a great communicator. He answered all my questions and showed me things I didn’t know I needed. I’m glad I hired him, as it saved me hours. I look forward to working with him again.

reviews.projectName: Project: monday.com expert needed for growing agency
reviews.reviewText: Excellent work and highly recommend Eddy! He was extremely knowledgeable about monday.com, very responsive with excellent communication. He understood our needs and quickly revamped our workflow. We will definitely continue an ongoing relationship with him. Thank you, Eddy - GREAT JOB!

onsiteConsulting.pricingText: Pricing varies depending on the location and the duration of each on-site implementation. Get in touch with us for more details and to receive a proposal

storiesWorthTelling.title: Stories Worth Telling
storiesWorthTelling.description: Below are some stories worth telling of clients using Monday.com to leverage their business and how WME Solutions can help you achieve the same results.
storiesWorthTelling.zippoDescription: By replacing spreadsheets with a dynamic Work OS, they saved three business days per month and cut six months off a major sales expansion.
storiesWorthTelling.o2PriorityDescription: At delivering hundreds of campaigns to millions of customers using Monday.com and boosting productivity, O2 transformed their workflow.
storiesWorthTelling.rayWhiteDescription: With a custom CRM on Monday.com Work OS using over 1,250 automations to handle 2,000 clients seamlessly.

storiesWorthTelling.studentHotelDescription: With tailored solutions from WME Solutions, your business can enjoy streamlined workflows and improved productivity.

clientSuccessStory.similarEfficiency: can help your business achieve similar efficiency with customized Monday.com solutions.

projects.title: Projected vs Actual Costs by Project
Map View of All Shipments
projects.description: View of Export, Import, domestic shipments on a world map where data can be seen and updated directly from the map or on the Monday.com board.

projects.title: Outbounds Shipments
projects.description: Used by an International Relocation company to track what needs to be done for each shipment. This board was displayed on a large screen for the team to have an overview of the status of each job

projects.title: Leads Management Board
projects.description: A board allowing to manage all leads by salesperson. This board is part of a CRM workflow with advanced automations in place

projects.title: Sales Pipeline & Costing
projects.description: Sales people able to generate a quotation from this board by first inputting various cost associated to each shipment

projects.title: Freight Rates Management
projects.description: Freight rates analysis coming from various suppliers that are used by the salespersons before generating quotations for clients.

projects.title: QR Codes Scan
projects.description: Scanning QR codes at the Factory changing automatically statuses and timers on the Monday board.

projects.title: Manufacturing Board 1/2
projects.description: Orders status for each station changing after the employees canning the orders at the factory.

projects.title: Live Dashboard - Daily Deliveries 1/3
projects.description: Tracking orders made by customers on different channels. Reporting was done daily, weekly and monthly. Reporting was made per location as this restaurant had several branches.

projects.title: Live Dashboard - Daily Deliveries 2/3
projects.description: We were able to tracking on the 2 bottom widgets the orders by geographical zones, and by type of customers

projects.title: Vacancy Checklist 1/2
projects.description: Fully automated checklist based on the move-out date allowing to track and manage hundreds of properties

projects.title: Automated Emails Integrations
projects.description: When an element of the checklist is about to be due or overdue, emails are sent automatically to the PIC and Managers based on a set of rules

projects.title: Client Overview Dashboard
projects.description: Used by a Marketing Agency to see what are the activity for a particular account. The leads are connected from the client's website so that everything can be managed within Monday.com

projects.title: Marketing Agency
projects.description: Marketing Agency

projects.title: Time Tracking Report on Toggl Integrated with Monday.com
2 Way Sync of the Tasks Between Monday.com and Toggl
Accounts Board
projects.description: The Accounts board tracks organizations, their details, and links them to opportunities. It also tracks projects that are associated with the different organizations.

projects.title: Opportunities Board
projects.description: The Opportunities board records new opportunities, associating them with accounts to streamline tracking. The sales team can create new projects in the different salesperson workspace when an opportunity reaches the 'Take Off' stage.

projects.title: Project Summary Board
projects.description: The Project Summary board provides the sales team with an overview of ongoing projects for better management and visibility.

projects.title: Project Board
projects.description: The Project board provides the detailed list of tasks the salesperson should follow during the project implementation process.

projects.title: Quote Generation
projects.description: The Opportunity Board with an item card for Quote Generation that allows users to create invoices and quotes directly from opportunities. Once an opportunity reaches a Proposal stage, users can generate a document with pre-filled details like job number, account, and pricing. Users can add specific requests from clients for different items in the item card. This streamlines the sales process, ensuring quick and accurate quote creation.

projects.title: Quote Document
projects.description: The generated document in Docugen using the prefill fields from the Opportunities board.

projects.title: Invoice Generation Retail 1/3
projects.description: The Monday CRM Quotes & Invoices feature allows users to easily create quotes and invoices by connecting their client list and product catalog to the invoice templates. This streamlines the billing process, saving time and ensuring accuracy. It simplifies client management with seamless integration of client and product data.

projects.title: Invoice Generation Retail 2/3
projects.description: The Monday CRM Quotes & Invoices feature allows users to easily create quotes and invoices by connecting their client list and product catalog to the invoice templates. This streamlines the billing process, saving time and ensuring accuracy. It simplifies client management with seamless integration of client and product data.

projects.title: Invoice Generation Retail 3/3
projects.description: The Monday CRM Quotes & Invoices feature allows users to easily create quotes and invoices by connecting their client list and product catalog to the invoice templates. This streamlines the billing process, saving time and ensuring accuracy. It simplifies client management with seamless integration of client and product data.

projects.title: Invoice Document
projects.description: The generated document using the Monday Quotes & Invoice feature.

projects.title: Organization Activity Summary
projects.description: The Organization Snapshot Dashboard provides an overview of activities such as emails, events, meetings, and calls, filtered by organization. It also tracks awards given to organizations, displaying categories like wins, shortlisted entries, highly commended, and those that didn't win.

projects.title: Activity Board
projects.description: The Activities board provides a centralized view of all activities, tracking both emails, meetings and call summaries for different organizations in one place. It allows users to stay updated on communication and task progress efficiently.

projects.title: Activity Summary Chart
projects.description: Activity summary chart provides a visual representation of the activities for the organization. This enhances workflow visibility and helps manage engagements seamlessly.

projects.title: Emails & Activities
projects.description: Emails and Activities logs all activities associated with the email column on the board. For example, you can send emails through this page to the contacts, add meeting notes and call summaries as well as create custom activities such as sales performance analysis, and contract negotiations so you can add all the necessary information associated with this contact.

projects.title: Activity Tracker
projects.description: The Activity Tracker tracks emails and other activities, displaying them under the name of the person who added them. It provides an overview of various activities added in the Emails and Activities such as emails, notes, call summaries as well as the custom activities such as sales performance analysis, and contract negotiations. Any new activity logged will instantly reflect in the chart.

projects.title: Email & Activities Timeline
projects.description: Emails & Activities Timeline tracks all activities for the past 45 days, displaying email interactions and activities such as meetings, notes, and custom activities that are added in the Emails & Activities item card. Daily activity is color-coded with pink representing incoming emails and blue for all other activities. This visual system helps users easily identify and manage communication flow and task progress.

projects.title: Lead Tracking Board
projects.description: This custom CRM is built for a construction and real estate company which streamlines lead tracking, including their sources, viewing follow-ups, and more.

projects.title: Viewings Board for Efficient Scheduling
projects.description: The viewings board is part of the CRM that enables the sales team to schedule unit viewings with leads and efficiently manage their schedule.

projects.title: Opportunity Tracking & Contract Generation Board
projects.description: The Opportunity board allows you to track all opportunities within your business, set contract terms, generate contracts, and send them electronically for signature.

projects.title: Units Occupancy & Lease Tracking Board
projects.description: The Units board is designed to track the occupancy of units across different sites. It effectively monitors occupancy, as well as current and past tenant information. A key feature of this board is the automatic lease renewal reminders for the sales team, ensuring timely follow-up with tenants to either end or renew their contracts.

projects.title: Lead Analysis Dashboard 1/2
projects.description: This dashboard provides a clear overview of sales performance, total leads, conversion rates, and contracts.

projects.title: Lead Analysis Dashboard 2/2
projects.description: This dashboard tracks inquiry types, viewing bookings, contract signings, and more, providing valuable insights to support better decision-making.

projects.title: IAMMETER Integration for Automated Energy Tracking
projects.description: Successfully integrated the IAMMETER platform with Monday.com, enabling both daily and monthly synchronization of electricity usage for all units. This ensures more accurate reporting and automates electricity bill generation and delivery to tenants.

projects.title: Monthly Tax Tracking Board 1/2
projects.description: This board was designed to track taxes on a monthly basis. The data is automatically rolled over, enabling the team to work more efficiently.

projects.title: Monthly Tax Tracking Board 2/2
projects.description: This board was designed to track taxes on a monthly basis. The data is automatically rolled over, enabling the team to work more efficiently.

projects.title: Centralized Tax Rollover for 800+ Boards
projects.description: Triggering the tax rollover process for over 800 boards from a high-level board that manages all clients.

projects.title: Automated Tax Rollover with Make.com
projects.description: This Make.com scenario enables, with a single click, the rollover of previous tax balances, preparation of upcoming months. This solution streamlines workflows, reduces errors, and enhances efficiency.

projects.title: Automated Data Archiving with Make.com
projects.description: This Make.com scenario archives data, keeping it accessible to the team while locking it for edits.

projects.title: Employee's Directory Overview
projects.description: A detailed screenshot of an employee directory interface, displaying sections for office staff, operation staff, and former employees. The interface includes columns for employee details such as onboarding status, position, contract type, department, supervisor, contract dates, and email addresses.

projects.title: Employee Profile Interface
projects.description: A comprehensive view of an employee's profile page, featuring sections for personal information, employment details, and paid time off (PTO). The interface includes fields for name, contact details, employment position, salary, and leave balance.

projects.title: Employee Type Distribution Map
projects.description: An interactive map displaying the geographic distribution of employees, with colored pins indicating different types of employees. This visualization helps in understanding the regional placement of various employee categories across the United States.

projects.title: Detailed Employee Survey Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard presenting various metrics from an employee survey, including job satisfaction trends, communication satisfaction rates, benefits satisfaction levels, and manager relationship ratings across departments. This visualization aids in identifying areas of employee contentment and areas needing improvement.

projects.title: Weekly Pulse Review Interface
projects.description: A screenshot displaying a 'Weekly Pulse Review' from an organizational feedback platform. The interface is segmented into categories such as 'New Reviews (Anonymous)', 'This month's Reviews', and 'Past Reviews', each listing reviews with details on productivity and emotional sentiment, along with star ratings and additional comments.

projects.title: Simple Weekly Check-In Form
projects.description: A straightforward digital form titled 'Weekly Check In – You Are Our Priority (Simple Version)' designed for employees to rate their week's productivity and emotional state using a star system, with space for open-ended responses and additional comments.

projects.title: Comprehensive Employee Feedback Form
projects.description: A detailed digital form titled 'Employee Surveys and Feedback (Detailed Version)' designed for in-depth employee feedback. It includes multiple sections asking for personal details, job satisfaction, communication effectiveness, managerial support, team dynamics, and personal suggestions for improving the workplace.

projects.title: Analyzing Employee Leave Patterns
projects.description: A detailed corporate dashboard displays various metrics including top leave takers, types of leave taken, and declined requests per employee, effectively visualizing human resources data to aid in management decisions. The dashboard uses bar graphs and a pie chart to break down leave statistics by individual and category.

projects.title: Organized Leave Schedule
projects.description: A detailed calendar display of employee leave requests for a month, marking out individual time-offs and holidays, ensuring a clear visual representation of staff availability and planned absences. The layout provides an efficient overview for management and team coordination.

projects.title: Scheduled Holidays Overview
projects.description: A detailed list of upcoming public holidays presented in an organized format, showing the specific dates and days of the week for each holiday, facilitating advanced planning and scheduling.

projects.title: Employee Leave Management Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive interface displaying various sections related to employee leave management, including pending approval requests, leave allowances, and a summary of remaining leaves per employee, which supports efficient tracking and decision-making for HR departments.

projects.title: Leave Request Management System
projects.description: An organized leave request platform showcasing different sections for 'Leave Requests Pending Approval by Management', 'Approved', and 'Request Declined'. This system details each request with information such as requester, type of leave, period, and approval status, providing a clear view of employee leave management.

projects.title: Employee Leave Form Submission Interface
projects.description: An intuitive leave request form designed for employees to submit requests for annual, business, or sick leave. The form includes fields for company ID, employee name, email, type of leave, date range, number of days off, and additional details to ensure comprehensive leave planning.

projects.title: Employee Onboarding Status Dashboard
projects.description: A detailed view of an employee onboarding dashboard, illustrating various employees' onboarding stages, start dates, progress bars, positions, departments, and status of essential documents such as offer letters, contracts, and company policies. This interface helps track the onboarding progress effectively.

projects.title: HR Key Performance Indicators Dashboard
projects.description: An extensive HR KPI dashboard for tracking and evaluating various performance metrics for 2023. This interface displays KPIs such as employee turnover, satisfaction, recruitment costs, time-to-fill positions, and more, each with a status update indicating if they are on track, need attention, or exceed targets.

projects.title: Candidate Overview
projects.description: A digital interface displays the profile of a job applicant, highlighting their application for a Social Media Manager position, sourced from LinkedIn, with detailed sections including contact details, application status, CV insights, and interview notes. The page also features AI-driven results evaluating their strengths and suitability for the role.

projects.title: Navigating Talent: An Applicant Tracking System
projects.description: A screenshot of an applicant tracking board, displaying various stages of the recruitment process such as new applications, review, interviews, and hiring outcomes. The board meticulously categorizes candidates by job titles, sources, and application dates, enhancing the recruitment workflow.

projects.title: Contract Management Workflow
projects.description: An interactive dashboard showing the contract management process across different stages, including new requests, contracts sent, and signed agreements. This dashboard also provides detailed insights into each employee’s position, department, salary details, and contract start dates.

projects.title: Employee Contract Detail View
projects.description: A detailed profile view of an employee, showcasing contract information such as start date, salary, job duties, and supervisory details, alongside options to generate and manage the contract status.

projects.title: Resource Allocation Management 1/3
projects.description: Analysis of the time spent by each team member on specific projects and the combined effort.

projects.title: Resource Allocation Management 2/3
projects.description: The workflow built allowed deep analysis of the team submitted work and compare it to time initially planned.

projects.title: Process Mapping for NGO with Worldwide Presence
Workload Management
projects.description: Used to manage the workload capacity of each individual, to see who is available to take a new project, who is overloaded, etc...

projects.title: Resource Allocation Management 3/3
projects.description: Detailed reporting of the time spent by an individual on specific projects and compare it to the theoretical time that was allocated. This reporting was used for one-on-one meetings between management and the employees.

projects.title: Employee Onboarding Form
projects.description: This form is used to submit new employee details, triggering the automatic onboarding process.

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.description: Easily tracking employee on/offboarding stages and their information.

projects.title: Employee Onboarding Checklist
projects.description: An employee onboarding checklist that is automatically generated, with all due dates set based on the start date, and the completion status of each task tracked throughout the onboarding process.

projects.title: Automated Onboarding Checklists with Make.com
projects.description: Implemented an automated process using Make.com to generate onboarding checklists for new employees, ensuring that both new hires and their managers are automatically assigned their respective tasks on the employee’s first day.

projects.title: Onboarding Checklist Tracking
projects.description: Onboarding checklist groups and tasks, which their completion status will be aggregated into a summary board for all new employees.

projects.title: Centralized Dashboard for Onboarding Progress 1/2
projects.description: A centralized project dashboard offering a clear overview of each employee's onboarding progress, tracking the completion of all stages in their process.

projects.title: Centralized Dashboard for Onboarding Progress 2/2
projects.description: This section of the dashboard displays the completion status of each stage.

appsPage.title: Our Selection of Monday.com Apps for Advanced Productivity
appsPage.description: Discover the power of Monday.com apps, a suite of add-ons designed to effortlessly enhance the Monday.com platform. These apps expand the platform’s capabilities, offering new functionalities without the need for custom development. Each app is a ready-to-use, and available on Monday marketplace. Explore these apps to streamline your processes, increase productivity, and elevate your project management experience with the convenience of out-of-the-box solutions.
appsPage.otherToolsTitle: Other Tools that can integrate with Monday.com

mondayTools.title: Auto-Increments Numbers
mondayTools.description: Discover the power of Monday.com apps, a suite of add-ons designed to effortlessly enhance the Monday.com platform. These apps expand the platform’s capabilities, offering new functionalities without the need for custom development. Each app is a ready-to-use, and available on Monday marketplace. Explore these apps to streamline your processes, increase productivity, and elevate your project management experience with the convenience of out-of-the-box solutions.

mondayTools.title: Autofill Group Name
mondayTools.description: Autofill Group Name is an app for monday.com that automates the updating of dropdown columns with the group name based on various triggers like item movement, creation, status change, or name alteration.

mondayTools.title: Approval & Feedback
mondayTools.description: The Approval & Feedback App is a versatile tool for monday.com users, designed to streamline the approval and feedback process through customized forms.

mondayTools.title: Copy Paste Master
mondayTools.description: Copy Paste Master is an app for monday.com that enables users to automate the copying and combining of data from various columns, and pasting it into another column, streamlining data management and customization.

mondayTools.title: Docugen
mondayTools.description: DocuGen is a document automation tool that generates custom documents using data from Monday.com boards.

mondayTools.title: GetSign
mondayTools.description: GetSign is a digital signature tool that enables the secure and efficient signing of documents online. Integrating GetSign with Monday.com allows users to seamlessly send documents from Monday.com boards for e-signature, track the signing process, and receive completed documents back into their Monday.com workflow. This integration streamlines the document signing process, enhancing efficiency and reducing the turnaround time for approvals and agreements within project management tasks.

mondayTools.title: Subitem Pro Templates
mondayTools.description: Subitem Pro Templates is an app for monday.com that simplifies managing items and subitems by enabling users to create, reorder, and deploy customized subitem templates across their boards.

mondayTools.title: Timeline to Date
mondayTools.description: Timeline to Date is an automation app for monday.com that synchronizes timeline data with start and end date columns.

mondayTools.title: Tag to Action
mondayTools.description: Tag to Action is a dynamic productivity tool for monday.com, enabling users to automate and efficiently manage their tasks and boards with custom actions.

mondayTools.title: VLOOKUP Auto-link
mondayTools.description: VLOOKUP Auto-Link is an advanced alternative to monday.com's connected boards. It allows you to automatically link multiple boards and match items while maintaining monday's native reporting, automation, and permissions.

otherTools.title: ClickSend SMS
otherTools.description: ClickSend SMS is a cloud-based service that enables sending and receiving of SMS messages globally.

otherTools.title: Make.com
otherTools.description: Make.com integrates with Monday.com to automate tasks and workflows, enabling seamless data synchronization and real-time updates between Monday.com and various apps and services.

otherTools.title: Todoist
otherTools.description: Todoist is ideal for on-the-go use, providing a mobile-optimized platform for managing tasks, setting reminders, and tracking progress.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.desc1: Ready to get the most out of monday.com for your company?
contactUs.desc2: Do not wait and get in touch with us now to discuss your needs

fullfillmentPolicy.title: Fulfillment Policy
fullfillmentPolicy.introduction: WME Solutions is committed to delivering high-quality consultancy services to optimize business processes and achieve organizational goals. This fulfillment policy outlines the terms and conditions for our service delivery, payments, and client obligations.

sections.title: 1. Service Delivery
content: We deliver services as outlined in the selected package or agreement.
Package validity, service hours, and included features are clearly specified in the agreement.
Services may include consultation, workflow development, support, training, or other specified tasks.

content.subtitle: Initial Payment
content.details: Full payment for the selected package or initial deposit is required before services begin. Payments may include a commitment fee, which is non-refundable.

content.subtitle: Pay As You Go Billing
content.details: For hourly services, charges will be billed weekly based on actual hours used, with a monthly retainer to secure on-demand support.

content.subtitle: Payment Methods
content.details: Payments can be made via wire transfer or credit card. Credit card payments incur an additional 3% processing fee.

sections.title: 3. Unused Hours
sections.content: Hours included in prepaid packages or initial payments are non-refundable.

sections.title: 4. Cancellations and Refunds
content: Hour-based packages (e.g., 25/50/100 hours) are non-refundable after purchase.
Pay As You Go services may be cancelled with one month’s prior notice.

sections.title: 5. Client Involvement
content: Successful delivery requires active participation, including regular consultations and timely feedback.
Clients must maintain active subscriptions for relevant platforms (e.g., Monday.com, Make.com) and notify us of any required adjustments in support capacity.

sections.title: 6. Transparency and Tracking
content: All tasks are logged using a time-tracking system (e.g., Toggl), providing clients with real-time visibility of service utilization.
Clients will receive a live reporting link and can schedule consultations through Calendly.

sections.title: 7. Confidentiality
sections.content: All client information and data shared during engagements are treated as confidential and will not be disclosed to third parties without explicit consent.

sections.title: 8. Limitations of Liability
sections.content: WME Solutions is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from service provision, except as required by applicable law.
